metadata.title: CVE-2021-3731 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
LedgerSMB does not sufficiently guard against being wrapped by other sites,making it vulnerable to 'clickjacking'. This allows an attacker to trick atargetted user to execute unintended actions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3731` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ledgersmb - 1.6.9+ds-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ledgersmb package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.9+ds-1ubuntu0.1').
